verses.kjv: O LORD, rebuke me not in thy wrath: neither chasten me in thy hot displeasure.
verses.ct: LORD, don't correct me while you're angry; don't discipline me in the heat of your fury.

verses.kjv: For thine arrows stick fast in me, and thy hand presseth me sore.
verses.ct: Your arrows have pierced deep into me, and your hand is pressing down hard on me.

verses.kjv: There is no soundness in my flesh because of thine anger; neither is there any rest in my bones because of my sin.
verses.ct: My body has no healthy part left because of your anger; my bones have no relief because of my sin.

verses.kjv: For mine iniquities are gone over mine head: as an heavy burden they are too heavy for me.
verses.ct: My guilt has risen over my head like floodwaters — it's a burden too heavy for me to carry.

verses.kjv: My wounds stink and are corrupt because of my foolishness.
verses.ct: My wounds are infected and rotting because of my own foolishness.

verses.kjv: I am troubled; I am bowed down greatly; I go mourning all the day long.
verses.ct: I am in anguish, completely bent over; I walk around grieving all day long.

verses.kjv: For my loins are filled with a loathsome disease: and there is no soundness in my flesh.
verses.ct: My sides burn with a terrible disease, and there is nothing healthy left in my body.

verses.kjv: I am feeble and sore broken: I have roared by reason of the disquietness of my heart.
verses.ct: I am weak and completely broken; I cry out because of the turmoil inside my heart.

verses.kjv: Lord, all my desire is before thee; and my groaning is not hid from thee.
verses.ct: Lord, you know everything I long for; my groaning is no secret to you.

verses.kjv: My heart panteth, my strength faileth me: as for the light of mine eyes, it also is gone from me.
verses.ct: My heart races, my strength has drained away, and even the light in my eyes has faded.

verses.kjv: My lovers and my friends stand aloof from my sore; and my kinsmen stand afar off.
verses.ct: The people who love me and my friends keep their distance from my suffering, and my relatives stay far away.

verses.kjv: They also that seek after my life lay snares for me: and they that seek my hurt speak mischievous things, and imagine deceits all the day long.
verses.ct: Those who want me dead set traps for me; those who want to harm me talk about destroying me and plot against me all day long.

verses.kjv: But I, as a deaf man, heard not; and I was as a dumb man that openeth not his mouth.
verses.ct: But I acted like someone who is deaf and didn't listen; I was like someone who is mute and never opens his mouth.

verses.kjv: Thus I was as a man that heareth not, and in whose mouth are no reproofs.
verses.ct: I became like a person who cannot hear, with no argument to offer in response.

verses.kjv: For in thee, O LORD, do I hope: thou wilt hear, O Lord my God.
verses.ct: Because I put my hope in you, LORD — you will answer me, Lord my God.

verses.kjv: For I said, Hear me, lest otherwise they should rejoice over me: when my foot slippeth, they magnify themselves against me.
verses.ct: I prayed, 'Listen to me, so that they won't celebrate over my downfall — so that when I stumble, they won't use it to exalt themselves over me.'

verses.kjv: For I am ready to halt, and my sorrow is continually before me.
verses.ct: I am on the verge of collapse, and my pain is always with me.

verses.kjv: For I will declare mine iniquity; I will be sorry for my sin.
verses.ct: I am ready to confess my guilt; I am deeply sorry for my sin.

verses.kjv: But mine enemies are lively, and they are strong: and they that hate me wrongfully are multiplied.
verses.ct: Meanwhile, my enemies are full of energy and powerful; those who hate me for no reason keep growing in number.

verses.kjv: They also that render evil for good are mine adversaries; because I follow the thing that good is.
verses.ct: Those who repay my kindness with cruelty oppose me because I pursue what is right.

verses.kjv: Forsake me not, O LORD: O my God, be not far from me.
verses.ct: Don't abandon me, LORD; my God, don't be far from me.

verses.kjv: Make haste to help me, O Lord my salvation.
verses.ct: Hurry to help me, Lord, my salvation.
